headline: What Adobe’s Cloud Expansion and 24.9% Drop Mean for Its True Value in 2025
summary: Wondering if Adobe stock is a bargain, overpriced, or something else entirely? Let's dig into what the numbers and trends really say about its current value. Adobe shares have seen some movement lately, climbing 1.3% over the last week but still down 24.9% so far this year. This points to a mix of shifting growth expectations and fresh risks. Recently, Adobe has been in the headlines thanks to its continued expansion into cloud-based creative tools and big strategic partnerships. These...
